TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit XmlFormatExtensionPointAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class XmlFormatExtensionPointAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class XmlFormatExtensionPointAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 为服务说明内的服务说明格式扩展指定要使用的 XML 命名空间和 XML 命名空间前缀。

span.span: Specifies the XML namespace and XML namespace prefix to use for a service description format extension within a service description.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 服务说明格式扩展扩展如何为使用 ASP.NET 创建的 XML Web 服务生成服务说明。A service description format extension extends how a service description is generated for an XML Web service created using ASP.NET. 具体而言，服务说明格式扩展将 XML 元素添加到服务说明。Specifically, a service description format extension adds XML elements to the service description. SOAP 扩展生成的 XML Web 服务的客户端和服务器端运行因为有关 SOAP 扩展的信息将不自动置于的服务说明时，这非常有用。This is useful when a SOAP extension is built to run on both the client and server side of an XML Web service, as information about SOAP extensions is not automatically placed in the service description. 如果你将有关 SOAP 扩展的信息添加到服务说明时，客户端可以因此解释它必须运行特定的 SOAP 扩展。If you add information about the SOAP extension to the service description, a client can thus interpret that it must run the specific SOAP extension. 必须在客户端和服务器上同时运行的 SOAP 扩展的一个示例是加密 SOAP 扩展。An example of a SOAP extension that must run on both the client and server is an encryption SOAP extension. 如果只在服务器上运行加密 SOAP 扩展并将返回值将其发送回客户端之前对其加密时，客户端必须运行才能解密该 SOAP 消息的 SOAP 扩展。If an encryption SOAP extension runs on only the server, and it encrypts return values before sending them back to the client, the client must have the SOAP extension running to decrypt the SOAP message. 否则，客户端无法处理的返回值。Otherwise, the client cannot process the return value. 使用以下步骤生成服务说明格式扩展：Use the following steps to build a service description format extension: 1. 生成一个类，派生自。Build a class that derives from . 2. 应用到类并指定应从该处运行的服务说明格式扩展的扩展点。Apply a to the class and specify the extension points at which the service description format extension should run. 3. 根据需要应用到类并指定类中的成员，使其作为新的扩展点。Optionally, apply a to the class and specify a member within the class to act as a new extension point. 4. 根据需要应用到类并指定要使用的生成的服务说明格式扩展的 XML 元素关联的 XML 命名空间前缀。Optionally, apply a to the class and specify the XML namespace prefix to be associated with XML elements generated by the service description format extension. 5. 配置要在中运行的服务说明格式扩展`serviceDescriptionFormatExtensionTypes`配置文件节。Configure the service description format extension to run within the `serviceDescriptionFormatExtensionTypes` section of the configuration file. ## Examples [!code-csharp[ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示实现在 属性中指定的服务说明格式扩展的类的成员是否可以接受原始 XML 元素。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the member of the class that implements the service description format extension specified in the property can accept raw XML elements.
